website_summaries.verdict: This reasonably priced Goodyear folding tire is a good option for those who prefer to ride off-road.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for its ability to handle high speeds and tough turns, especially in off-road conditions
Made by a trusted name in tires
cons: Riders who prefer tires that are on the rigid side may find this tire too flexible

customer_reviews.title: They're not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: These tires barely lasted, I used them to commute to work and they didnt hold up in the few moments I used it. I was expecting better for this brand. I should have invested my money on something a bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace tire on my son's city bike. Better than the more expensive Thick-slick tire the bike came with. Solid black and minimal tread makes it "cool" enough for the city bike and a lot safer than the slick. Not sure about durability but at this price if he gets a year out of it, it will be worth it. I will even consider using it for my X-bike when the much more costly Vittoria tires finally wear out. I'd give it 5 stars but unsure about the durability at this point.
customer_reviews.author: D. Patrick L

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tire, but the walls of the tire are very thin, I had one blow out from the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Owens

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: over 700 miles on it , a little tricky mounting on
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tire for the price 💯👍
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this tire you can't get any thing better at this price range. I had replaced my rear tire with these 6 months ago, and so far haven't had any issues only 1 flat since I've had em which is pretty remarkable since where I live the roads are in bad shape. I've put about 250 miles on em so far and everything seems fine so far, these tires have good rolling resistance, grip and excellent traction; I'd buy them again👍
customer_reviews.author: SwaGG_Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have almost 2,000 miles on these in 2 years and they show no signs of giving up. They are extremely durable (all miles are on paved streets/roads) and provide plenty of confidence with the grip. I have no regrets buying these for my bike and would re-buy in a heartbeat...but for now, they are showing no sign that they need to be replaced. They were easy to install and each week I check the pressure and top off when needed. Its that simple and you won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a solid tire.
customer_reviews.text: At a market where good 700 cm x 28 tires are at least $30, these tires compare well to better brands such as Continental or Kenda. It may not be the best for professional bikers, but are durable and light for the beginner racer and great for everyday commuting. The tread on the tire provides a solid grip on dirt while still rolling well on roads.
customer_reviews.author: M L

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but fairly solid
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a less expensive tire but it has a reasonable amount of thickness for its cost. Have ridden about 250 miles on them so far and they've handled well. No flats and good grip on wet Portland streets. Hard to rate durability after such a brief trial so maybe I'll update if something negative happens over the next 250 miles?
customer_reviews.author: S. Rozell

customer_reviews.title: Check details of tire before buying
customer_reviews.text: Dislike :There was no metal wire rim built into The tire rim on both sides to hold in the wheel groove. I pumped up tire but without a metal rim tire folded off the wheel . It maybe a manufacturing error Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't beat these GoodYear tires for you bike. Am very pleased with the quality of the tires. Have installed them on heavier bike and my weight is 210 lbs. They have approx. 1000 miles on them now and with no issues and very little tread wear. Have bought 2 more for my other bikes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: goldwingers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. Installed with ease. You should not be disappointed with these tires.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've used 2 sets of these tires, and for the price, they've been great. No issues with punctures or blowouts and they're durable enough for short rides on gravel chip trails. Both sets have lasted about 1000 miles before the tread is getting low. Overall, great tire for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Heck of a tire for a remarkable price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decent tire for a fixed gear that I was building. For the price these tires can not be beat!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Drye

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent tire size
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 700 X 28, the box said 700 X 28, tire is stamped as 700 X 37, and tire measures 31MM wide. I have no idea what they are selling. Needless to say returned today.
customer_reviews.author: DaveFL

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN HIPSTER TREADLESS TYRES
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these tyres: I bought them to replace the treadless tyres that came on my hipster single speed bike. Ended up costing less and much better performance. Grippier and roll nicely. I've put on about 500+ miles and no flats, yet. It looks like I can get another 1,000 miles. Excellent for commuting.
customer_reviews.author: DBR

customer_reviews.title: great value and ride feel
customer_reviews.text: rode this set all summer and they still have some life left. Got about 2500 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Day

customer_reviews.title: a good buy
customer_reviews.text: all's well, no problems, a great buy for the average rider on city streets.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: good , inexpensive tire
customer_reviews.text: they were a bit tough to get on rim first time because of shape during packaging
customer_reviews.author: mitchell langseth

customer_reviews.title: Goodyear bicycle tires, size700c
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Trek road bike, requires 700c size tires, I chose this brand name expecting quality, and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David Ruki Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tire
customer_reviews.text: I love these tires. Good quality for a low price
customer_reviews.author: John Linnet

customer_reviews.title: installation is simple.
customer_reviews.text: It comes folded in a small box. It is easy to put on the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 700c for Giant Escape 3
customer_reviews.text: Put on the front of my Giant Escape 3 to match the one I bought from Wally World... which no longer has any bike parts in stock. Love the matching Goodyear logos and much more confidence on longer bike rides.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: I used them in a Gravel Bike Ride . . . and was Perfect !!
customer_reviews.author: Filiberto

customer_reviews.title: I have repaired or replaced thousands of tires over a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have repaired or replaced thousands of tires over a span of 50 + years. These tires were a challenge to install but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: They are durable and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for 3 months and they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy c.

customer_reviews.title: A very good bicycle tire
customer_reviews.text: A very good bicycle tire. I do not care about the folding option, I just needed a new tire, and a purchase to make my $35 for free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ekholm

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Fine tire for the price. I really prefer my pair of gatorskins though.
customer_reviews.author: Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tire, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on durability, but they are good tires for road + sidewalk use. Would not hesitate to use these for a 20 mile ride, or more. Too narrow to be a real hybrid tire IMO, but it's really just what I needed. The price was excellent. Thanks to Amazon for cross shipping a free return when I accidentally got the wrong tire! Now my tires match again, and I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: hoytpr

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and excellent tires
customer_reviews.text: I changed from 700×25c to 700×28c this tires make my rides really smooth now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK For the price
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to be too sturdy . Bt for the price it's OK
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Make the tires wire bead on the sides
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how prone to flats these tires are due to how weak the sides of the tire are and the construction in general.
customer_reviews.author: dorian lopez

product_meta.title: Goodyear Folding Bead Road Bike Tire, 700 cm x 28, Black
product_meta.description: Replace your old bike tires with these Goodyear bicycle tires featuring a folding bead. Rugged and tough, these bicycle tires are built to last.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
